Observation Notes

Informal documentation of staff gathering during Night Aquarium Event preparations. Team morale high. This image serves as a reminder that behind every observation log and research report are dedicated individuals who make this facility possible.

Not all mysteries are sinister. Sometimes they're just people doing their jobs.
